[00:00.00]Youngblood - 5 Seconds Of Summer
[00:00.43]Lyrics by：Andrew Watt/Ali Tamposi/Ashton Irwin/Calum Hood/Luke Hemmings/Louis Bell
[00:00.86]Composed by：Andrew Watt/Ali Tamposi/Ashton Irwin/Calum Hood/Luke Hemmings/Louis Bell
[00:01.30]Remember the words you told me love me 'til the day I die
[00:05.70]
[00:08.52]Surrender my everything 'cause you made me believe you're mine
[00:13.80]
[00:16.30]Yeah you used to call me baby now you calling me by name
[00:21.85]
[00:25.12]Takes one to know one yeah
[00:27.07]You beat me at my own d**n game
[00:29.61]
[00:33.23]You're pushing and pushing and I'm pulling away
[00:35.41]Pulling away from you
[00:37.12]I give I give I give you take give and you take
[00:40.12]
[00:40.94]Young blood
[00:42.03]Say you want me
[00:42.94]Say you want me
[00:43.91]Out of your life
[00:45.67]And I'm just a dead man walking tonight
[00:49.33]
[00:50.08]But you need it yeah you need it
[00:51.63]
[00:52.25]All of the time
[00:53.66]Yeah ooh ooh ooh
